artist: Artist: Jack Thomas Chick; Publisher: Chick Publications, Ontario, Calif.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and a photomechanical illustration of a hand with a raised index finger printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 20 pp.
title: Chick Publications: One Way!
